tidbits.title: Microstate in Europe
tidbits.description: Liechtenstein is a small landlocked microstate nestled in the Alps, known for its stunning mountainous landscapes and picturesque villages.

tidbits.title: Financial Hub
tidbits.description: The country serves as a financial hub, offering favorable tax laws and a thriving economy driven by banking and financial services.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Despite its size, Liechtenstein has a rich cultural heritage, seen in its museums, castles, and love for the arts and classical music.
